title: To live until you die
creator_credit: WGBH (Boston), Time-Life Films, Eric Davidson and Andrew Maclear
brief_description: A documentary about Elisabeth Kubler-Ross and her work. Doctor Kubler-Ross is a trained medical practitioner and psychiatrist and has specialised in the care of dying patients - both young and old. Her work concentrates on the re-education of people’s attitudes towards dying, and a great deal of her time is spent, not only with patients, but also lecturing to others.
